QuestData.Title: A Choice to Make
QuestData.Description: We're ready to start building. All that we need is for you to make a choice.$B$BThe blueprints are on the drafting table. Take a look.$B$BThen, let me know if we're going to construct a corral or a tankworks.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Drafting Table to choose between the construction of a Corral or a Tankworks.
QuestData.RewardText: This is a momentous occasion, commander. Thazz'ril and his peons will get to work right away.$B$BYou'll see; this decision is going to be critical in our efforts against the Warsong.
